events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue was classified under the Refund cluster due to keywords indicating a request for money back.
Support agent Alex has been assigned to handle this refund request from the customer.
Hello! I understand you would like to request a refund. I am here to assist you with this process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a clear picture showing that the item is incorrect.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the money back within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and solution! I appreciate your help in resolving this issue promptly.
The refund has been processed and your case is now resolved. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and everything is satisfactory. We're here if you need anything else.
This refund case has been formally closed after successful resolution and customer confirmation.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on your recent refund experience.
